entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -9.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 2:31 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -9.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: NNE 29 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
